channel.title: Battletech
channel.description:
After playing me some good olde' MW4, came to me the idea of a thread exclusively for those who think alike in Battlet(m)ech appreciation. All hail the late FASA!
[img]https://img638.imageshack.us/img638/6521/mechwarriormercswallpap.jpg[/img]
A few questions to start the thread rolling.
[b] 1. What was your first encounter with Battlemech universe? 1. Which of Mech-piloting games is your fav? 1. Favourite chassis. You can choose several designs for each tonnage class. 1. Or did you enjoy any designs other than Mechs? 1. Favourite armaments. 1. What do you favor most when assembling your variant in Mechlab? Do you crank the engine revs up or do you load up on so many weapons that it could eradicate a third-world country in half a day? Jump jets and electronics or armor? Sniper or Brawler? Beam, Missile or ballistic? 1. Inner Sphere or Clans? [/b] Think it's enought for now.
I'll go ahead and answer first:
1. Very first? MW3, but I didn't get to play much of it since it was 2 month before MW4 hit the streets. Apparaz it was already in development whn MW3 wasn't even finished yet. Didn't get to play tabletop. 1. Mechwarrior 4 : Vengeance and Mercenaries. The first one was a majestic effort that was so rare for the time - those briefing vids, although sometimes poorly acted - were great and immersive. And the atmosphere of pure epic revenge mission. And the story actually made a lot of sense. Mercs were a pure feel good badass holywood action. Class. 1. [b][COLOR='Lime']Light[/b]: Cougar, 35 tons [img]https://trm.mektek.net/images/cougar.gif[/img] [b][COLOR='Yellow']Medium[/b]: Uziel, 50 tons; Shadow Cat, 45 Tons. [img]https://trm.mektek.net/images/uziel.gif[/img][img]https://trm.mektek.net/images/shadowcat.gif[/img] [b][COLOR='DarkOrange']Heavy[/b]: Mad Cat / Timber Wolf, 75 tons [img]https://trm.mektek.net/images/madcat.gif[/img] [b][COLOR='Red']Assault[/b]: Awesome, 80 tons; Longbow, 85 tons; Atlas (+Warlord MekTek variant), Daishi / Dire Wolf, Fafnir, Behemoth / Stone Rhino I & II, 100 tons. [img]https://trm.mektek.net/images/awesome.gif[/img][img]https://trm.mektek.net/images/longbow.gif[/img][img]https://img31.imageshack.us/img31/2078/unledhoh.png[/img] [img]https://trm.mektek.net/images/daishi.gif[/img][img]https://trm.mektek.net/images/fafnir.gif[/img][img]https://trm.mektek.net/images/behemoth.gif[/img][img]https://trm.mektek.net/images/behemoth2.gif[/img] 1. Overlord & Talon Dropships, Demolisher 2 tank, Shilone Bomber. 1. LRMs, MRMs, Any sort of Gauss, Normal (red IS) Large lasers/pulse lasers, Normal PPCs and Autocannons (rotary or light/extended range preferable). Sometimes LBXes 1. Fuck the speed and Jump jets, maximum armor and weapons. Only electronics that are absolutely required. I'll make a fast brawler once in a while, but sniping from the top of the hill is my credo. 1. I used to be a Clanner - but Inner Sphere kicks arse. Clans are twats and got their ass handed to them despite their mega technology.
P.S. You can use this [url='https://trm.mektek.net/index_mechs.htm']link[/url] to look up your fav chassis.

item.title: Battletech
item.dc:creator: k3nny1550
item.description:
I have both Mech Assault games for the original Xbox. In fact, Mech Assault 1 was the very first game I played for the Xbox.

Light, I went for the Puma variant of the Cougar. Sure, the missiles aren’t as good but you get nullsig.

Medium, Uziel with double PPCs and jumpjets. Or the Mad Dog variants in Lone Wolf. Autocannons are good mix between power and rapid fire, which is good for use in the medium chassis. Jammers for missiles are also essential if you want to stand a chance against heavy class mechs. Definitely want some extra speed so you can hit and run.

Stieletto with the flamethrower + null sig is great for the cool factor alone.

Heavy, I generally prefer things with PPCs or gauss guns as compared to LRMs. Mad Cats aren’t my most favorite choice. I liked the Blood Asp with the double PPCs, machine guns, and LRMs + Alpha Strike abilities from Mech Assault 2. Atlas variants are also a good pick, providing a good mix of protection and firepower.

I really wished you could drive the VTOL in single player.

Haven’t gotten to use Mechlab. Is that part of the PC series?

I remembered liking House Kurita in MA2. Sounded almost like new-age tribal warriors.

item.dc:creator: Vitriol
item.description:
You have to get it to go online which should be automatic, although it doesn’t seem to go online for me very often.

Under “File”, hit “Offline Mode”.

Sometimes I need to leave it running for a while, sometimes overnight. Then go to “Available Games” and Mercs should be on the list. It will update to the latest version.

The alternative I mentioned is MXC (I think) which is posted in the MechWarrior 4 : Mercenaries forum. As I said, I haven’t tried it out myself yet.

You can torrent the MTX file for Mercs, copy it to the correct folder then use MTX to “Install it” if you have trouble getting it to go online (although i’ve never had to do it this way either).

item.title: Battletech
item.dc:creator: Vitriol
item.description:
1, MechWarrior 2 : 31st Century Combat
Loved the game, and the Archive Holoprojector got me hooked on the Battletech Universe

2, MechWarrior IV : Mercs
Now a free game available from https://www.mektek.net, although I have bought the game 3 times previously due to worn out/damaged disks.

If you’re going to download the game, check the forums first. Some people have trouble with MekTeks download program, but there are workarounds and potentially an alternative installer made by a well known and respected community member (he has only just posted the first version a few days ago and I haven’t checked it out yet).

I still play this online almost every weekend on the +PT+Sunder server.

On occasion I also play the MechWarrior : Living Legends mod for Crysis Wars. Full combined arms combat. I actually prefer being in a tank most of the time in this game though.

3, Light
Kitfox/Uller

Medium
Nova/Blackhawk, Black Lanner, Stormcrow/Ryokin

Heavy
Mad Dog/Vulture, Ebon Jaguar/Cauldron Born, Timberwolf/Madcat

Assault
Warhawk/Masakari, Kodiak, Deimos, Canis

4, Some of the tanks look great. Demolisher II and Shrek come to mind.
Also a big fan of Battle Armour like the Salamander and Gnome

5, PPC, Heavy Lasers, LBX Autocannons, Rotary Autocannons

6, Moderate speed heavy hitter with Jump Jets or “Ripper” (rapid firing) configs.

7, Clan Ghost Bear. No question.

These are models I’ve done (modelled in Wings 3D, rendered in Blender)

Mad Dog mkIV/Vulture mkIV

Ebon Jaguar/Cauldron Born (still a work in progress)
